### For Maintainers
**Priority Assessment:**
- [ ] P0 - Critical (fix immediately)
- [ ] P1 - High (fix in current sprint)
- [ ] P2 - Medium (fix in next sprint)
- [ ] P3 - Low (fix when possible)

**Components Affected:**
- [ ] Frontend
- [ ] Backend
- [ ] Database
- [ ] API
- [ ] Authentication
- [ ] CI/CD
- [ ] Documentation

**Effort Estimate:**
- [ ] XS (< 1 day)
- [ ] S (1-2 days)
- [ ] M (3-5 days)
- [ ] L (1-2 weeks)
- [ ] XL (> 2 weeks)
